title: Ocean Week points issue
body:
_Update 2: All bonus points earned have been credited for the weekend._

_Update: Bonus points should be adding correctly now!_

Hey everyone,

We're aware of the Ocean Week points issue and it's being looked into. 

The Melbourne battle was won in record time, so well done on that! Now that the battle is over, you can still earn points - we're aware that Summoner's Rift isn't granting the 2x bonus it should for this weekend and are investigating.

Sorry about this!

replies.body: Why can't I see my points i've contributed, like it tells me to inlist where it should tell me my points but im already pledged when i try to enlist again ????
It takes a while for them to go in trust me i won 1 but it took a while then i won 3 more then 4 points popped up

Thank you for fixing this. I just had a game and I did in fact get the 2 points. Though, does that mean that all the points we should have gotten but didn't are gone forever or will we still be getting all the points we have already earned? I know that would make a difference for me and it sounds like it is the same for Tentacle Touch.
The bonus points have been credited - if you earnt them and they didn't show up, they are now added!

Just keep playing and it will change it happens to me too.  {{champion:35}} 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
why am i level 2 in the forum but i am level 11 in the game.
Danggg... I only have 5 hours to get 4 wins for the mystery champ since I'm away next week. All is good though, thanks for trying your hardest to get on top of the issues.
